whereami 0.1.9

whereami counter

Source: R/counter.R
counter.Rd

Interact with internal whereami counter

counter_state(item = NULL, tag = NULL)

counter_reset(item = NULL, tag = NULL)

counter_names()

counter_tags()

counter_get()

Arguments

item

character, name of the counter to access, Default: NULL
tag

character, tag of the counter to acces, if it was set at initial whereami call. This can be used instead of the item name, Default: NULL

Details

counter_names() returns names of the active stored counters.

counter_state() returns current hit count for item, if NULL then all counters are returned.

counter_reset() will remove counter of item, if item is NULL then all counters are reset.

counter_get() returns a table with all the counters. These can then be plotted with the with the plot method.

A json log of the counter is written to file.path(tempdir(),'whereami.json') by default The path can be set using set_whereami_log

Examples


tf <- tempfile(fileext = '.R')

# call to write to temp file
f1 <- "whereami::cat_where(whereami::whereami(tag = 'tag1'))"
f2 <- "whereami::cat_where(whereami::whereami(tag = 'tag2'))"

# write to the file (call at line 3)
cat('\n\n',f1,'\n\n',f2,sep='',file = tf)

source(tf)
#> ── Running eval(ei, envir) at file316c44722ff9.R#3 (1) ─────────────────────────
#> ── Running eval(ei, envir) at file316c44722ff9.R#5 (1) ─────────────────────────

counter_state()
#> $`/tmp/RtmpMR8TFT/file316c44722ff9.R#3`
#> [1] 1
#> 
#> $`/tmp/RtmpMR8TFT/file316c44722ff9.R#5`
#> [1] 1
#> 

counter_state(tag = 'tag1')
#> [1] 1

counter_names()
#> [1] "/tmp/RtmpMR8TFT/file316c44722ff9.R#3"
#> [2] "/tmp/RtmpMR8TFT/file316c44722ff9.R#5"

counter_tags()
#> /tmp/RtmpMR8TFT/file316c44722ff9.R#3 /tmp/RtmpMR8TFT/file316c44722ff9.R#5 
#>                               "tag1"                               "tag2" 

counters <- counter_get()

counters
#>    tag                where            path                when count
#> 1 tag1 file316c44722ff9.R#3 /tmp/RtmpMR8TFT 2019-11-05 00:18:29     1
#> 2 tag2 file316c44722ff9.R#5 /tmp/RtmpMR8TFT 2019-11-05 00:18:29     1

# using counter_reset and counter_names in a loop

for( i in 1:10 ){

  source(tf)

  if( counter_state(tag = 'tag1') > 5 )
    counter_reset(tag = 'tag2')
}
#> ── Running eval(ei, envir) at file316c44722ff9.R#3 (2) ─────────────────────────
#> ── Running eval(ei, envir) at file316c44722ff9.R#5 (2) ─────────────────────────
#> ── Running eval(ei, envir) at file316c44722ff9.R#3 (3) ─────────────────────────
#> ── Running eval(ei, envir) at file316c44722ff9.R#5 (3) ─────────────────────────
#> ── Running eval(ei, envir) at file316c44722ff9.R#3 (4) ─────────────────────────
#> ── Running eval(ei, envir) at file316c44722ff9.R#5 (4) ─────────────────────────
#> ── Running eval(ei, envir) at file316c44722ff9.R#3 (5) ─────────────────────────
#> ── Running eval(ei, envir) at file316c44722ff9.R#5 (5) ─────────────────────────
#> ── Running eval(ei, envir) at file316c44722ff9.R#3 (6) ─────────────────────────
#> ── Running eval(ei, envir) at file316c44722ff9.R#5 (6) ─────────────────────────
#> ── Running eval(ei, envir) at file316c44722ff9.R#3 (7) ─────────────────────────
#> ── Running eval(ei, envir) at file316c44722ff9.R#5 (1) ─────────────────────────
#> ── Running eval(ei, envir) at file316c44722ff9.R#3 (8) ─────────────────────────
#> ── Running eval(ei, envir) at file316c44722ff9.R#5 (1) ─────────────────────────
#> ── Running eval(ei, envir) at file316c44722ff9.R#3 (9) ─────────────────────────
#> ── Running eval(ei, envir) at file316c44722ff9.R#5 (1) ─────────────────────────
#> ── Running eval(ei, envir) at file316c44722ff9.R#3 (10) ────────────────────────
#> ── Running eval(ei, envir) at file316c44722ff9.R#5 (1) ─────────────────────────
#> ── Running eval(ei, envir) at file316c44722ff9.R#3 (11) ────────────────────────
#> ── Running eval(ei, envir) at file316c44722ff9.R#5 (1) ─────────────────────────

plot(counter_get())

# read the json log
jsonlite::read_json(
file.path(tempdir(),'whereami.json'),
simplifyVector = TRUE)
#>     tag                where            path                when count
#> 1  tag1 file316c44722ff9.R#3 /tmp/RtmpMR8TFT 2019-11-05 00:18:29     1
#> 2  tag2 file316c44722ff9.R#5 /tmp/RtmpMR8TFT 2019-11-05 00:18:29     1
#> 3  tag1 file316c44722ff9.R#3 /tmp/RtmpMR8TFT 2019-11-05 00:18:29     2
#> 4  tag2 file316c44722ff9.R#5 /tmp/RtmpMR8TFT 2019-11-05 00:18:29     2
#> 5  tag1 file316c44722ff9.R#3 /tmp/RtmpMR8TFT 2019-11-05 00:18:29     3
#> 6  tag2 file316c44722ff9.R#5 /tmp/RtmpMR8TFT 2019-11-05 00:18:29     3
#> 7  tag1 file316c44722ff9.R#3 /tmp/RtmpMR8TFT 2019-11-05 00:18:29     4
#> 8  tag2 file316c44722ff9.R#5 /tmp/RtmpMR8TFT 2019-11-05 00:18:29     4
#> 9  tag1 file316c44722ff9.R#3 /tmp/RtmpMR8TFT 2019-11-05 00:18:29     5
#> 10 tag2 file316c44722ff9.R#5 /tmp/RtmpMR8TFT 2019-11-05 00:18:29     5
#> 11 tag1 file316c44722ff9.R#3 /tmp/RtmpMR8TFT 2019-11-05 00:18:29     6
#> 12 tag2 file316c44722ff9.R#5 /tmp/RtmpMR8TFT 2019-11-05 00:18:29     6
#> 13 tag1 file316c44722ff9.R#3 /tmp/RtmpMR8TFT 2019-11-05 00:18:29     7
#> 14 tag2 file316c44722ff9.R#5 /tmp/RtmpMR8TFT 2019-11-05 00:18:29     1
#> 15 tag1 file316c44722ff9.R#3 /tmp/RtmpMR8TFT 2019-11-05 00:18:29     8
#> 16 tag2 file316c44722ff9.R#5 /tmp/RtmpMR8TFT 2019-11-05 00:18:29     1
#> 17 tag1 file316c44722ff9.R#3 /tmp/RtmpMR8TFT 2019-11-05 00:18:29     9
#> 18 tag2 file316c44722ff9.R#5 /tmp/RtmpMR8TFT 2019-11-05 00:18:29     1
#> 19 tag1 file316c44722ff9.R#3 /tmp/RtmpMR8TFT 2019-11-05 00:18:29    10
#> 20 tag2 file316c44722ff9.R#5 /tmp/RtmpMR8TFT 2019-11-05 00:18:29     1
#> 21 tag1 file316c44722ff9.R#3 /tmp/RtmpMR8TFT 2019-11-05 00:18:30    11
#> 22 tag2 file316c44722ff9.R#5 /tmp/RtmpMR8TFT 2019-11-05 00:18:30     1

# clear all counters
counter_reset()

#verify that there are no active counters
counter_state()
#> [1] "No active counters"

# cleanup
unlink(tf)
